column1: Children's social care data in England 2025 – Provider level as at 31 March 2025
This worksheet contains one table, this table begins in cell A4. Column A includes a link to the Ofsted social care provider webpage for each provider, links will open in a new window.
Some cells in this table are empty. This is in instances where the column refers to data that is not applicable for that provider type.
